程序包 src.main.java.Category_story6_7

类 AddController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Category_story6_7.AddController
public class AddController extends Object
This controller manages the add transaction window in the Transaction Management System. It allows users to input new transaction details and saves them to a CSV file. The controller provides a user-friendly interface for adding transactions and handles data validation and persistence.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the add transaction window by setting up the classification and IO type ComboBoxes.

    • handleSave

      private void handleSave()
      Handles the save button click event. Validates user input, creates a new transaction, and saves it to the CSV file.

    • saveTransactionToCSV

      private void saveTransactionToCSV(Transaction transaction)
      Saves a transaction to the CSV file.
      参数:
      transaction - The transaction to be saved.

    • handleCancel

      private void handleCancel()
      Handles the cancel button click event. Closes the add transaction window without saving any changes.

    • isAdded

      public boolean isAdded()
      Checks if a transaction has been added.
      返回:
      true if a transaction has been added, false otherwise.

    • getTransaction

      public Transaction getTransaction()
      Gets the newly added transaction.
      返回:
      The newly added transaction object.

    • getNextId

      private String getNextId()
      Generates the next available ID for a new transaction.
      返回:
      The next available ID as a string.

    • formatDate

      private String formatDate(LocalDate localDate)
      Formats a LocalDate object to a string in "yyyy-MM-dd" format.
      参数:
      localDate - The LocalDate object to be formatted.
      返回:
      The formatted date string.
